thread.title: Ethical Investing Thrives When There’s ‘Bad’ News

author: Derek Horstmeyer
title: Ethical Investing Thrives When There’s ‘Bad’ News
text:
What drives individuals to invest their money in accordance with their own ethical views of the world?
An analysis of fund inflows into U.S. stock ETFs and mutual funds that invest with a social, governance or environmental purpose (often called sustainable, ESG or impact funds) paints an interesting picture of investor psychology.
